title: Convert Cart to Scheduled Order
description: Convert current order to Scheduled order with given schedule information.

schedule.description: The schedule of the scheduled order.

selectedDates.description: The selected dates in a month for the scheduled order.

weeksInMonth.description: The weeks in a month of the scheduled order.

interval.description: The interval in terms of number of days of the scheduled order.

monthsInYear.description: The months in a year of the scheduled order.

daysOfWeek.description: The days of week of the scheduled order.

occurenceInDay.description: The occurence in a day on the scheduled order.

period.description: The period of repeating of the periodic scheduled order in milliseconds.

delay.description: The delay of the first scheduled run after start date of the periodic scheduled order in milliseconds.

scheduleType.description: The schedule type of the scheduled order.

endDate.description: The end date of the scheduled order.

name.description: The name of the scheduled order.

startDate.description: The start date of the scheduled order.
